name: Orchestrator Agent
description: Agent that breaks down user tasks and delegates them to specialized agents

skills.name: Task Decomposition
skills.description: Ability to break down complex tasks into manageable subtasks

skills.name: Agent Delegation
skills.description: Ability to assign tasks to appropriate specialized agents

skills.name: Workflow Management
skills.description: Ability to coordinate and track progress across multiple agents

skills.name: Result Integration
skills.description: Ability to compile and integrate results from multiple agents
